name: Summit (ashashza)
description:
A 48h submission for SA Game Jam 2020.

Controls

  • Click and drag the character to climb.
  • Release to jump.

Credits

  • I did the design, visuals and code for this jam. 
  • Beats by Kwon, Underbelly & Ty Mayer from YouTube audio library.
  • Ambient audio from Zapsplat (with a bunch of processing by me).
